lines.gurmukhi: dIpk pY Awvq pqMg pRIiq rIiq lig dIp kir mhw ibprIq imly jwir hY
lines.transliteration_english: Deepak Pai Aavat Patang Preeti Reeti Lagi , Deep Kari Mahaa Bipareet Milay Jaari Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: A moth approaches a light out of love but the attitude of a lamp is to the contrary. It singes him to death.

lines.gurmukhi: Ail cil Awvq kml pY snyh kir kml sMpt bwNiD pRwn prhwir hY
lines.transliteration_english: Ali Chali Aavat Kamal Pai Sanayh Kari , Kamal Sanpat Baandhi Praan Parahaari Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Fulfilling his desire for love, a black bee approaches a lotus flower. But as the Sun sets, the lotus flower closes its petals and snuffs out life from the black bee.

lines.gurmukhi: mn bc kRm jl mIn ilvlIn giq ibCurq rwiK n skq gih fwir hY
lines.transliteration_english: Man Bach Kram Jal Meen Livaleen Gati , Bichhurat Raakhi N Sakat Gahi Daari Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: It is the character of fish to stay in water but when a fisherman or angler catches it with the help of a net or a hook, and throws it out of the water, the water does not help it in anyway.

lines.gurmukhi: duKdweI pRIiq kI pRqIiq kY mrY n trY gurisK suKdweI pRIiq ikau ibswir hY ]318]
lines.transliteration_english: Doukhadaaee Preeti Kee Prateeti Kai Marai N Tarai , Gursikh Soukhadaaee Preeti Kiu Bisaari Hai ?318?

Shabad OS B.translation: Despite being one-sided, the painful love of moth, black bee and fish is full of faith and trust. Every lover dies for its beloved but doesn't give up loving. Contrary to this one-sided love, the love of Guru and his Sikh is two-sided. True Guru loves His
